cxro.common.io.modbus.client

Class WriteRWDiscreteTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • cxro.common.io.modbus.client.ModbusTransaction
      • cxro.common.io.modbus.client.WriteRWDiscreteTransaction

  • public final class WriteRWDiscreteTransaction
extends ModbusTransaction
    Class implementing a WriteSingleDiscreteRW transaction. The implementation directly correlates with the modbus function (FC 05) Write Single Coil. It encapsulates the corresponding request and response messages.

    RWDiscretes are understood as discrete bits that are Read/Write.

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws ModbusIOException,
                    ModbusServerException,
                    ModbusException,
                    ModbusInterruptedException
        Executes this ModbusTransaction.

        1. Pack request message. 2. Call parent to perform Modbus transaction 3. Unpack response message.

        Overrides:
        execute in class ModbusTransaction
        Throws:
        ModbusException - if an I/O error occurs, or the response is a modbus protocol exception.
        ModbusIOException
        ModbusServerException
        ModbusInterruptedException
